entities.name: gratitude

entities.description: Happiness is a subjective experience that varies from person to person, influenced by factors such as social connections, gratitude, positive emotions, and flow.

entities.description: Feelings that are experienced subjectively and can influence behavior and well-being.

entities.description: Difficult situations or problems one faces.
